meanings.definition: A recording of a radio or television broadcast for review or evaluation.
meanings.sent1: I listened to the aircheck of the radio show to see how it sounded.
meanings.sent2: The station manager asked for an aircheck of yesterday's broadcast.
meanings.sent3: The aircheck of the TV program revealed some technical issues.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like an aircheck, capturing every detail of the show.
meanings.sent5: The aircheck preserved the voices of the presenters for future reference.

meanings.definition: To make a recording of a radio or television broadcast for review or evaluation.
meanings.sent1: He will aircheck the morning show to check for any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She always airchecks her interviews to improve her hosting skills.
meanings.sent3: I aircheck the news segment to make sure it is clear and concise.
meanings.sent4: The producer airchecks every episode to ensure quality content.
meanings.sent5: Before airing the show, they aircheck it to catch any errors.
